english.segment1: VERSE 1. You breathed and the stars arrived, maching in perfect time into the night. You spoke and the light appeared, marking the days and years of our lives.
english.segment2: CHORUS: You hold it all together, You hold it all forev - er. You hold it all, You started it all, You are my all in all.
english.segment5: You loved in the greatest way, giving Your life away for all that was lost. You conquered the enemy, darkness is trembling, You are alive.
english.segment7: BRIDGE. The Lord is my light and my salvation in life, I will not fear, no, I will not fear. (repeat bridge)
english.segment10: OUTRO. I will not fear, I will not fear, 'cause You hold it all. Yeah.
english.segment11: . You Hold It All. VERSE 1. You breathed and the stars arrived, maching in perfect time into the night.
